Upcoming Events

October 7-13, 2007

National Fire Prevention Week

Practice Your Escape Plan

Join America participate in fire safety preparedness and prevention. Stay abreast of events and activities in your community by checking back with us this fall to use the HomeHero™ event calendar or by calling your neighborhood fire department and local authorities.

Join us this August as we launch the HomeHero™ Fire Safety Event Calendar

Here you will find special fire safety events, clinics and seminars in your city or community that can help you and your family learn more about fire safety and prevention. We will point you to upcoming activities as we count down to celebrate National Fire Safety Week October 7-13, 2007.

HomeHero is concerned for your family’s safety and protection. Celebrate National Fire Safety Prevention Week year round.

Fire Prevention Week

October 7-13, 2007

Protect your family by educating yourself about fire safety awareness and prevention.
